en-US.summary: Learn about upcoming events by CrowdShakti.
examplePhrases: Alexa ask CrowdShakti about upcoming events
Alexa ask Crowdshakti about next events
en-US.name: CrowdShakti
en-US.description:
Ask CrowdShakti for upcoming events, and learn about upcoming events organized by CrowdShakti.

To start, just say "Alexa, ask CrowdShakti for upcoming Events". 

At anytime, you can stop by saying "Alexa, stop"
